Overall good service, chicken was a little dry but that might just be my taste. Sauces were up to standard and the burger was extremely good. Will buy again 10/10

Portal 1 oyununun devamı olan portal 2'de müthiş bir oyun! 2. oyunun bulmacalarını daha güzel buldum ve sadece bu da değil hikaye bittikten sonra oyun bitiyor sanıyorsanız yanılıyorsunuz. Hikaye bitse de oyunda kendi bulmacanızı yapabiliyor ve oynayabiliyorsunuz. Bu da oyunun devamlılığını sağlamakta. 20 30 TL bile verilmeye değer bir oyun. Bir deneyin derim :)
Не такая злая, как первая часть.  Более динамичная, головоломная и разнообразная. Пасхалки из Халфы и тонкий юмор одной старой подруги повеселят изрядно. Годно.
i guess it was fun... to make my friend fall >:D
Ein herrlich kniffliges Spiel mit viel Witz. Absolute Empfehlung =) (all time fav)
The story is a masterpiece in my opinion. Fun gameplay to tag along with it. Thinking with portals.
Найс игра, но мозг ломает порой)

I have this game on my ps3 and I used to play it all the time with my friends on co-op. But one of my favorite things about this game is the story, And honestly going through it again was just amazing. Although it may not be the longest game it's definitely one of my favorite.
This is how you do a sequel. Such an amazing game. Do I need to say anything else when everyone talked to death about what makes this game so good.
If you're studying atmosphere and dry humor (or just enjoy those things) this game is a master class.
portal are of the in the yes

A classic the second it rolled out of Valve's pipeline. Still a must-own for any gamer to this day, and I see no reason why it won't remain the Great Expectations of gaming along with Portal forever. Amazing concept, execution, art, atmosphere. I would recommend (and do recommend) this game to just about anyone.
Wirklich schöne Spielidee. Besonders der Koop-Modus macht sehr viel Spaß, ist gut umgesetzt und bietet eine Abwechslung zu Online-Ballerspielen. Hier kann mal ein wenig die grauen Zellen anstrengen.

genuinely one of the best games ever. it terrifies me. i have to play while someone is with me or i'll die. i don't usually cry, ever, but almost every time i've gotten to the end i have bawled my eyes out like a little baby. GLaDOS is one of my favourite characters ever and this is my favourite game in general. but, then again, i don't play too many games. the soundtrack is amazing (i listen to it every day), the story is incredible and the characters are so so great. some of my favourite things about characters are the voices, and the voices in this game are the best. the visual design of everything is so eerie but pleasing. everything about this game is phenomenal, even when i'm 11 years late to it. plus, i love robots!

интересная головоломка с хорошей реализацией, много уровней, а также пойдет на слабых компудахтерах. 
Рекомендую к покупке!
值得头晕目眩也要玩通关的游戏

The amount of character development in this game versus the first is just insane. The first Portal will always be a classic yes, but this game is almost completely different... This game has so much back story and "umpff" that the first one lacked in and really opened up a portal (haha get it?) to this game's universe and shows us more into what Aperture Laboratories is and was. If you are an advent Half-Life lover such as myself, you will find that this game adds more into THAT universe and gives more lore to explore. GLAD0S turned out to be so much more than we thought and I am so thankful that this game gave her more of a "voice" and we got to actually get to know her more than just some scary, bad ass super computer that hangs from the ceilings of her chamber.
yes good story hopefully they come out with a portal 3
